posts.post_content: T206 Mathewson, white cap, Well centered.  Freshly graded,  Strong PSA 2, no  creases.    Please see my ebay feedback under carolenny.  SOLD

That’s a nice card!!! Unfortunately, I don’t need a white cap at the moment. Let me know if you ever have a dark cap at the same grade/price range! I’d be very interested. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
I’ll take it. Send PayPal info.
